name: RealmRush
description:
The Goblins are coming to destroy your village!

You start with two towers to place. They can be moved by clicking on them but you have to wait until they are completely gone before you can put them somewhere else.

You get gold for killing each Goblin( the further away from your village they are, the more gold you get.

When you get 100 gold you can get a new tower (up to a total of 9)

Try to kill all the Goblins before the village gets to zero health.

(It dosent matter if you don't - I haven't written that part of the game yet!)
